#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long a,b,carry,pre,x,y;
	while(1)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(a==0&&b==0)
            break;
        pre=0;carry=0;
        while(a||b)
        {
            x=a%10;y=b%10;
            if((x+y+pre)>=10)
                {
                    pre=1;
                    carry++;
                }
            else
                pre=0;
            a/=10;b/=10;
        }
        if(carry>1)
            cout<<carry<<" carry operations.\n"<<endl;
        else if(carry==1)
            cout<<carry<<" carry operation.\n"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"No carry operation.\n"<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
